BTCUSD.title: Ordinals price prediction 2025 – 2031: Can ORDI surge 100X?
BTCUSD.body: Key Takeaways: Our Ordinals price prediction anticipates a high of $29.81 in 2025. In 2027, it will range between $50.88 and $59.50, with an average price of $52.31. In 2030, it will range between $154.84 and $186.05, with an average price of $160.42. In December 2023, ORDI became the first BRC-20 token to breach $1 billion in market capitalization. Following this achievement, ORDI gained attention from DeFi enthusiasts for its role in innovation. The Ordinals protocol allows data to be embedded directly on Bitcoin’s smallest unit—the Satoshi. ORDI was the first token inscribed on the Ordinals protocol; like Bitcoin, it has a maximum supply of 21,000,000 coins. Currently trading at the $8 mark, investors can’t help but speculate on Ordi’s price trajectory. How high will ORDI go? Can ORDI surge 100x? What will the price of ORDI be in 2030? Let’s explore the ORDI price prediction from 2025 to 2031. Overview Cryptocurrency Ordinals Symbol ORDI Current price $8.32 Market cap $174.77M 24-hour trading volume $38.73M Circulating supply 21M All-time high $96.17 on Mar 5, 2024 All-time low $2.86 on Sep 11, 2024 24-hour high $8.95 24-hour low $8.18 Ordi price prediction: Technical analysis Metric Value Price volatility 8.87% 50-day SMA $9.05 200-day SMA $9.34 Sentiment Bearish Green days 16/30 (53%) Fear and Greed Index 71 (Greed) Ordi price analysis On the day of writing (October 4), ORDI’s price dropped by 5.51% in 24 hours and 0.11% in the last seven days. Its trading volume dropped by 17.16% showing less trader conviction in the market. ORDI/USD 1-day chart ORDIUSD chart by TradingView The Ordinal daily chart shows that ORDI trades along the Williams alligator trendlines, signaling an uneventful market as the price bounced off support levels ($7.70 Fibonacci midpoint) and key moving averages. The coin has registered negative momentum in the last 7 days. The MACD and signal lines of the Moving Average Convergence Divergence indicator are below zero, signaling a bear market. At the same time, the relative strength index is in neutral territory at 44.51. It is oversold when the RSI falls below 30. ORDI/USD 4-hour chart ORDIUSD chart by TradingView Technical analysis of the 4-hour chart shows that ORDI is moving sideways at the $8.39 mark with MACD confirmation (-0.029). The William Alligator trendlines show falling volatility. ORDI technical indicators: Levels and action Daily simple moving average (SMA) Period Value ($) Action SMA 3 8.69 SELL SMA 5 8.40 SELL SMA 10 8.46 SELL SMA 21 9.09 SELL SMA 50 9.05 SELL SMA 100 9.17 SELL SMA 200 9.34 SELL Daily exponential moving average (EMA) Period Value ($) Action EMA 3 8.78 SELL EMA 5 8.85 SELL EMA 10 8.91 SELL EMA 21 9.05 SELL EMA 50 9.17 SELL EMA 100 9.38 SELL EMA 200 11.87 SELL What to expect from ORDI price analysis next? ORDI is bearish at current levels, with the fear and greed index showing greed among investors. Over the short term, ORDI remains correlated with Bitcoin, which is just below $122,000. The charts show it will continue downwards but with less volatility. Why is ORDI down? ORDI’s drop reflects technical triggers, Bitcoin-driven risk aversion, and technical overextension. Its status as a “Bitcoin beta” leaves it exposed during dominance rallies, while thin liquidity magnifies moves. Recent news: Ordinals can now bridge to Cardano Cardano has continued to advance as a venue for Bitcoin Defi, facilitating a transfer of Ordinals to its mainnet. The transaction between Bitcoin and Cardano was facilitated by BitVMX, an interoperability protocol built using the BitVM programming language and unveiled at the Bitcoin 2025 conference in Las Vegas. Will ORDI reach $50? Yes, ORDI should rise above $50 in 2027. The move will come as the market recovers to previous highs. Will ORDI reach $100? According to the Cryptopolitan price prediction, ORDI will reach $100 in 2029 and reach a maximum price of $130.84. Will ORDI reach $1,000? Per the Cryptopolitan price prediction, it remains highly unlikely that ORDI will get to $1,000 before 2030. What is the prediction for Ordi in 2030? According to the 2030 Ordinals price prediction, they will range between $154.84 and $186.05, with an average price of $160.42. What is the Sats ordinal price prediction for 2050? When we extrapolate Ordi’s price predictions, we find that it is likely to reach a high of $421 in 2050. Does ORDI have a good long-term future? According to Cryptopolitan price predictions, ORDI will trade higher in the coming years. However, factors like market crashes or difficult regulations could invalidate this bullish theory. Is ORDI a good investment? ORDI had the first-mover advantage on the Ordinals protocol. ORDI, like Bitcoin, has a capped supply of 21 million coins and should, therefore, become scarce over time. Our Cryptopolitan Price Prediction shows how the coin will gain value in the years to come. The average price for the year will be $10.54. Ordinals ORDI price prediction 2027 Ordinals coin price prediction climbs even higher into 2027. According to the predictions, ORDI’s price will range between $50.88 and $59.50, with an average price of $52.31. Ordinals crypto price prediction 2028 Our analysis indicates a further acceleration in ORDI’s price. It will trade between $74.87 and $89.71 and average at $77.48. Ordinals price prediction 2031 The highest price for 2031 is $273.59. It will reach a minimum price of $231.22 and an average price of $237.64. ORDI price prediction 2025 – 2031 Ordinals market price prediction: Analysts’ ORDI price forecast Platform 2025 2026 2027 Coincodex $21.09 $17.17 $9.74 Digitalcoinprice $19.36 $22.77 $31.25 Gate.io $9.20 $11.31 $14.03 Cryptopolitan Ordinals price prediction Our predictions show that ORDI will achieve a high of $29.81 in 2025. In 2027, it will range between $50.88 and $59.50, with an average of $52.31. In 2030, it will range between $154.84 and $186.05, with an average of $160.42. Note that the predictions are not investment advice. Seek independent consultation or do your research. ORDI’s historic price sentiment ORDI price history by CoinGecko According to CoinMarketCap, ORDi started trading in May 2023 at $25.3466. It later fell, reaching its lowest value of $2.86 in September 2023. Binance listed ORDI on November 17, 2023. However, due to a lack of clear information from Binance, there needed to be more clarity, leading many to mistakenly believe that ORDI was a direct product of the Ordinals protocol. This misunderstanding contributed to ORDI’s dramatic market performance. The meme coin saw a 40% increase in value within a single day, culminating in a 100% rise over four days. Despite these fluctuations, ORDI’s popularity surged, and by the end of 2023, its price had climbed above $50. ORDI peaked in March 2024, hitting an all-time high of $96.17. It later moved into a bear run, and by April, it had already dropped by 50%. It started recovering in November, rising above the $35 mark, and $48 in December. In 2025, the trend quickly reversed and fell below $12 in February and $8 in May. In July, it was trading below $10. In October, it traded above the $8 mark.

BTCUSD.title: How High Can Ethereum (ETH) Go This ‘Uptober’? ChatGPT Breaks It Down and Names a Cheaper Must-Buy Crypto for 2025
BTCUSD.body: The Uptober month is already living up to its name, with Ethereum (ETH) returning to the limelight as specialists foresee a possible breakout higher than $5,000, and as high as $5,500. More institutional inflows, optimism regarding the upcoming Fusaka upgrade, and higher Layer-2 adoption are all helping to create bullish momentum for the world’s second-largest altcoin. But while ETH’s potential upside remains strong, investors are becoming more interested in a much more high-upside play, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) , with far greater growth potential at a fraction of the expense. At a mere $0.035, Mutuum Finance has been one of the most popular DeFi projects in 2025 with its twin lending infrastructure, real-yield mechanics, and non-custodial smart contracts tackling critical inefficiencies of decentralized finance. With Stage 6 of its presale over 55% sold out, 16,750+ holders, and over $16.8 million raised, MUTM could outshine ETH in the next run. Ethereum (ETH) Positions Itself for a Strong Uptober Rally Ethereum (ETH) is positioning itself for a potential explosive rally in October 2025, with prices keeping their strength around $4,300 after a steep bounce above $4,000. October, which is known as “Uptober” among traders, historically comes with average returns of nearly 5%, and this time the setup looks even stronger. Institutional demand is increasing as ETH investment funds attract hundreds of millions of inflows, with big players such as BlackRock ongoing in developing its network. At the same time, 30% of the ETH supply is now staked, locking up coins and removing circulating supply from the network, as deflationary token burns further tighten market dynamics. With exhausted exchange reserves, potential Federal Reserve rate cuts, the bullish BTC trend, and greater crypto euphoria around key U.S. events, analysts say that a breakout above $5,000 is eminently within the realm of possibility. But although ETH displays dazzling upside, the vast majority of investors seeking greater growth potential are starting to eye Mutuum Finance (MUTM) for out-of-proportion returns. Mutuum Finance Presale Surge as Investor Frenzy Hits All-Time High Mutuum Finance has been providing early adopters with the special opportunity to purchase MUTM tokens at a lower cost before the project is officially launched. Phase 6 tokens available at $0.035 have been extremely sought after, presale already reaching over $16.8 million and having over 16,750 owners. The figures say volumes of active market enthusiasm and increasing faith in the future of the long-term business. Besides locking down the platform and engaging with community members, Mutuum Finance also partnered with CertiK to create an official Bug Bounty Program with an official $50,000 USDT bug bounty pool. The program invites white-hat hackers, security researchers, and developers to report codebase vulnerabilities with rewards paid out depending on severity. This ensures that even the minor problems are addressed as quickly as possible and general platform security is high. Mutuum Finance to Roll Out New DeFi Lending & Borrowing Protocol Mutuum Finance has announced the upcoming release of its own lending and borrowing protocol , a giant leap towards decentralized finance. The V1 will launch on Sepolia Testnet in Q4 2025 and will have the fundamental components like a liquidity pool, mtToken, debt token, liquidator bot, etc. Since ETH and USDT are supported from the start for lending, borrowing, and collateralizing, the platform aims to offer a stable and scalable foundation for users of DeFi. To access recent and real-time prices, Mutuum Finance employs Chainlink oracles along with high-cap token feeds like USD, ETH, MATIC, and AVAX. Fallback oracles, composite data feeds, and on-chain price references are provided, which allow multi-layered functionality to supply robust and secure price data in the face of ultra-abnormal market chaos. Ethereum’s “Uptober” rally may propel ETH to over $5,000, yet its potential is capped compared to the early-stage possibilities. Mutuum Finance (MUTM), which at only $0.035 is already more than 55% sold in phase 6 with $16.8M raised, presents much greater growth potential. Its dual lending ecosystem, real-yield structure, and robust presale traction make MUTM the top DeFi altcoin for investors seeking disproportionate 2025 returns. For more information regarding Mutuum Finance (MUTM) please use the following links: Website: https://mutuum.com/ Linktree: https://linktr.ee/mutuumfinance

BTCUSD.title: Top 5 Cloud Mining Services Compared: Why GBC Mining Leads in 2025
BTCUSD.body: The cryptocurrency landscape continues to evolve, and mining remains one of the most reliable ways to generate passive income in the digital asset space. However, traditional mining requires significant upfront investment in hardware, technical expertise, and ongoing operational costs. This is where cloud mining services have revolutionized the industry, making Bitcoin mining accessible to everyone. With numerous options available today, choosing the right solution for digital currency mining can be overwhelming. This comprehensive review will help you understand why GBC Mining stands out as a leading platform for both beginners and experienced crypto investors looking to diversify their income streams without the hassle of managing physical equipment. What Makes GBC Mining Different? GBC Mining is a trust cloud mining site that eliminates the barriers traditionally associated with cryptocurrency mining. Instead of purchasing expensive ASIC miners, dealing with electricity bills, or managing cooling systems, you can start earning Bitcoin within minutes through their user-friendly interface. The company operates state-of-the-art mining facilities with the latest hardware, allowing users to purchase mining contracts and receive daily payouts directly to their accounts. With transparent operations and competitive pricing, the platform has quickly become a preferred choice among crypto investors worldwide who want professional-grade mining without the technical complexity. Getting Started: A Simple Step-by-Step Guide Starting your mining journey with GBC Mining is remarkably straightforward: Step 1: Registration Visit the GBC Mining registration page and create your account. The process takes less than two minutes, and new users receive a $20 welcome bonus to start mining immediately without any initial investment. Step 2: Choose Your Mining Plan Browse the available mining plans on the platform. GBC Mining offers various options suitable for different budget levels and investment strategies, from entry-level contracts to enterprise-scale solutions. Step 3: Activate Your Contract Select your preferred plan and activate it with a few clicks. Payment options include cryptocurrency and traditional methods for maximum convenience. Step 4: Start Earning Once activated, your mining contract begins generating daily profits automatically. You can monitor your earnings in real-time through the intuitive dashboard that displays your hashrate, daily income, and total returns. Step 5: Withdraw Your Profits Access your earnings at any time through the main platform . Withdrawals are processed quickly, ensuring you have full control over your funds whenever you need them. Available Mining Plans GBC Mining offers flexible mining contracts designed to accommodate various investment levels: Mining Plan Price Duration Daily Profit Total Profit Antminer S19 $20 1 day $1.20 $1.20 Whatsminer M30S++ $100 2 days $1.20 $2.40 Antminer S19K Pro $400 3 days $6.00 $18.00 Antminer T21 $1,000 5 days $17.00 $85.00 Whatsminer M60S $1,500 7 days $30.00 $210.00 Avalon A15 $2,500 10 days $55.00 $550.00 Antminer S21 $4,000 15 days $96.00 $1,440.00 Antminer S21 XP Imm. $6,000 20 days $150.00 $3,000.00 Antminer L9 $7,500 25 days $195.00 $4,875.00 ALPH Miner AL1 $11,000 30 days $308.00 $9,240.00 Antminer S23 Hyd. $15,000 35 days $450.00 $15,750.00 DCTANK AW1 $50,000 35 days $1,600.00 $56,000.00 ANTSPACE HD5 $110,000 50 days $3,850.00 $192,500.00 ANTSPACE MD5 $150,000 60 days $6,000.00 $360,000.00 Why Mining Makes Sense in 2025 The current market conditions make 2025 an optimal time to engage with best cloud mining opportunities. Bitcoin’s increasing institutional adoption and improving regulatory clarity create a favorable environment for mining operations. Additionally, the upcoming halving cycles historically correlate with significant price appreciation, potentially amplifying mining returns. Professional mining services allow you to participate in this growth without the technical complexities. As energy costs rise globally, individual mining becomes increasingly impractical, while professional operations benefit from economies of scale and renewable energy sources. This approach ensures sustainable and profitable operations that individual miners simply cannot match. The crypto market’s maturation also means more sophisticated investors are looking for reliable passive income streams. Mining provides this opportunity without the volatility of trading or the complexity of DeFi protocols. Key Advantages of GBC Mining No Hardware Required : Forget about purchasing, maintaining, or upgrading expensive mining equipment that becomes obsolete within months. Immediate Start : Begin earning within minutes of registration, with your welcome bonus ready to deploy. No waiting for equipment delivery or installation. Professional Management : Experienced teams handle all technical aspects, ensuring maximum uptime and profitability. This includes hardware maintenance, software updates, and infrastructure optimization. Flexible Investment Options : Plans ranging from $20 to $150,000 accommodate all investor types, whether you’re testing the waters or deploying significant capital. Daily Payouts : Receive your earnings daily rather than waiting for lengthy accumulation periods. This improves cash flow and allows for faster reinvestment strategies. Transparent Operations : Real-time monitoring and clear contract terms ensure you always know your investment status. No hidden fees or surprise deductions. Mobile Accessibility : Access your mining operations anytime through the intuitive interface, designed for seamless management on any device. User-Friendly Design : The platform features clear navigation perfect for beginners while offering advanced analytics for experienced investors. Top 5 Cloud Mining Services: Detailed Comparison 1. GBC Mining Pros : Competitive daily returns across all contract tiers, $20 welcome bonus for new users, flexible contract durations from 1 to 60 days, instant contract activation, transparent fee structure with no hidden charges, wide range of investment options ($20 to $150,000), customer support with 24/7 availability, beginner-friendly interface with advanced features, efficient withdrawal processing, established track record, accessible design, reliable returns, comprehensive management tools Cons : Newer platform with less brand recognition than established competitors 2. ECOS Pros : Established reputation since 2017, mobile application available for iOS and Android, regulated operations Cons : Higher minimum investment starting at $49, lower profit margins, longer contract lock-in periods with less flexibility, complex fee structure that reduces actual returns, limited contract variety, restricted capabilities for smaller investors 3. BitFufu Pros : NASDAQ-listed parent company providing institutional backing, professional-grade infrastructure Cons : Significantly higher entry costs exceeding $100 minimum, limited plan flexibility with standardized contracts only, lower ROI percentages compared to competitors, restricted withdrawal options with weekly limits, complex verification requirements, less accessible for retail investors 4. KuCoin Mining Pros : Integrated with KuCoin exchange ecosystem for easy fund transfers, established brand Cons : Limited options with only 3-5 active plans, lower daily returns, mandatory platform tokens (KCS) required for optimal rates, geographical restrictions in multiple countries, inconsistent contract availability 5. Bitdeer Pros : Multiple cryptocurrency options including BTC, ETH, and LTC mining, transparent operations Cons : Higher service fees ranging from 3-5% of profits, complex pricing structure difficult for beginners, maintenance costs affecting profitability, longer payout processing times (48-72 hours), frequent sold-out contracts during high demand Honorable Mention: Binance Mining Pros : Strong brand recognition and large user base, integrated with Binance ecosystem Cons : Requires existing Binance account with completed KYC verification, limited plan customization with fixed contract terms, potentially lower returns compared to dedicated platforms, frequent changes to terms and conditions, higher minimum thresholds for withdrawal, regional restrictions apply Why GBC Mining Stands Out Among the Top 5 When comparing options across the industry, GBC Mining delivers exceptional value through its combination of institutional-grade infrastructure with accessible pricing and transparent operations. While competitors like ECOS and Bitdeer focus on complex contract structures, GBC Mining prioritizes simplicity and profitability. The $20 welcome bonus gives new users a genuine opportunity to test the platform before committing larger investments. This approach has helped thousands of investors start their journey with confidence and real understanding of how the system works. GBC Mining offers competitive daily profit percentages, fast activation times, and flexible withdrawal policies. Whether you’re investing $20 or $150,000, you receive consistent service and returns that define a quality experience. The platform doesn’t discriminate based on investment size—everyone gets the same professional treatment. The platform provides a solid choice for those seeking passive crypto income, offering features typically found in premium solutions at accessible price points. The management tools ensure you can oversee your investments from anywhere, making it convenient for busy professionals and active traders alike. Ready to explore this opportunity? Register now , claim your $20 welcome bonus, and explore available mining plans designed for profitability and sustainability. ETHUSD.title: Big Move: Ethereum Foundation Trades $4.5M ETH For Stable Assets
ETHUSD.body: Ethereum’s steward moved part of its crypto coffers this week, converting a chunk of ETH into stablecoins as it adjusts how it funds projects and grants. Foundation Moves To Stablecoin Holdings According to reports, the Ethereum Foundation converted 1,000 ETH into stablecoins using the decentralized trading router CoW Swap, a transaction worth about $4.5 million at the time. The move was executed as part of the foundation’s ongoing treasury actions and was presented as a step to secure more predictable funds for research, grants, and donations. The specific stablecoin or coins received in exchange were not publicly named in initial reports. The Foundation’s treasurer has been managing a broader plan. Reports have disclosed a previously stated intention to convert up to 10,000 Ether over a period of weeks, and this latest trade appears to be an element of that phased approach rather than a one-off sale. Holding stable assets gives the foundation a clearer view of its short-term spending power while it evaluates longer-term strategy. 1/ Today, The Ethereum Foundation will convert 1000 ETH to stablecoins via @CoWSwap ‘s TWAP feature, as part of our ongoing work to fund R&D, grants and donations, and to highlight the power of DeFi. — Ethereum Foundation (@ethereumfndn) October 3, 2025 Use Of Decentralized Trading Tools The choice to use CoW Swap — a decentralized aggregator that aims to reduce slippage and market impact — was highlighted in public coverage. By routing the trade through decentralized infrastructure instead of a single centralized exchange, the Foundation reduced some counterparty and custody concerns. The execution method was described as careful and aimed at protecting the value of the sale during the swap. Alongside the transaction, internal operational decisions have also been articulated. The Foundation indicated it temporarily applied the breaks on open submissions of a grant for its Ecosystem Support Program in order to give attention to the large influx of proposals and prioritize urgent or high-impact work. Changes in leadership and institutional reorganization, have also been discussed publicly as part of recent organizational action, portrayed in a manner that suggests a transition is underway internally to accompany any change in the direction of treasury management as well. What Comes Next For The Treasury Market watchers noted that converting ETH to stablecoins is a common liquidity-management tactic. Volatility in ETH’s price can make budgeting for multi-month support programs difficult; stable assets can smooth out planning. While some community members saw the sale as a reduction of ETH holdings, others pointed out that the foundation’s core mission — to support Ethereum’s development — remains unchanged. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from TradingView

ADAUSD.title: Here’s What XRP Market Cap Multiplier Effect Means
ADAUSD.body: Every crypto bull market has its buzzwords, but few have sparked as much curiosity among XRP holders as the so-called “market cap multiplier effect.” It’s the idea that XRP’s true price potential isn’t limited by its large total supply — because only a fraction of that supply is actively available on the market. In other words, XRP’s liquidity reality may be far smaller than its theoretical supply, meaning smaller inflows of capital could trigger disproportionately large price reactions. Understanding the Market Cap Multiplier In a recent video, Jake Claver, managing partner at Digital Wealth Partners, tackled the growing debate head-on: “People look at total supply of XRP when, in reality, the supply-demand dynamics are going to be on the available supply of XRP,” he explained. This distinction — between XRP’s total supply of 100 billion and the much smaller circulating amount that actually trades — is at the heart of the multiplier effect. Let's look at what the XRP market cap multiplier effect means pic.twitter.com/5tiUdpHt6i — Jake Claver, QFOP (@beyond_broke) October 3, 2025 Claver illustrated this with a practical example: “There might be 2 billion XRP left on exchanges — probably less than that if you include retail and what they’re going to exit or sell.” He added that even if XRP’s price skyrockets to $10, $20, or even $50, some retail investors would inevitably sell portions of their holdings, adding perhaps another billion XRP to the liquid market. But that still represents a small share of total supply. The Math Behind the Multiplier Claver broke down the logic simply: “If you only had, let’s say, 2 billion [XRP] out of 100 billion, you’d be that 50x that Zach Rector talks about. It’s total supply versus available supply — and that’s why you get a shift in how much liquidity moving in is going to cause the market cap to rise in a multiplier effect.” When buyers enter the market, their demand impacts a smaller pool of available tokens, rather than the total supply. This limited float magnifies price movements, which in turn amplifies market capitalization faster than would occur in a fully distributed asset. Institutional Holdings and Market Liquidity Claver also revealed that his firm, Digital Wealth Partners, currently manages around 200 million XRP, accounting for roughly 8% of retail-owned XRP, based on his estimates. This institutional custody further concentrates holdings, reducing the amount of XRP readily available on exchanges. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 “Retail doesn’t hold more than maybe 1.2 to 2 billion total XRP in my opinion,” he said, emphasizing that these liquidity dynamics are critical for understanding XRP’s future price behavior. Broader Context and Implications While the multiplier concept doesn’t change XRP’s total supply — which remains capped at 100 billion — it reframes how market participants should interpret liquidity and price discovery. Ripple’s monthly escrow releases , typically capped at 1 billion XRP, also control how much new supply enters circulation, keeping active liquidity relatively tight. The takeaway is clear: XRP’s potential price response is not purely a function of total supply, but of how much XRP is actually tradable. As Claver summarized, “It’s total supply versus available supply. That’s the reason there is a multiplier effect.” The XRP market cap multiplier effect shows how small changes in liquidity can lead to significant price movements. It’s not speculation — it’s a structural feature of how XRP trades in real-world conditions, where limited availability magnifies every dollar of demand that flows into the asset. DOGEUSD.title: Are These the 2 Best Cryptos to Buy as Trump-Backed Thumzup Media Expands Dogecoin Mining With $2.5M Investment?
DOGEUSD.body: Thumzup Media, a Trump-backed company, has announced that it has invested $2.5 million in ramping up Dogecoin mining activities with hundreds of additional ASIC rigs and a significant boost in network hash power. The move has rekindled bullish interest in Dogecoin (DOGE), with some speculating that institutional entry may take its price beyond the $1 mark during the next bull run. That said, though DOGE’s momentum is worth keeping an eye on, more seasoned investors are now turning their attention to Mutuum Finance (MUTM) with much greater upside potential. Now at only $0.035, Mutuum Finance has already emerged as one of 2025’s most formidable DeFi plays thanks to its dual lending ecosystem, real-yield tokenomics, and non-custodial smart contract architecture. Presale Stage 6 is already over 55% sold, with more than 16,750 holders and more than $16.8 million raised, all of which are positive indicators of institutional and whale confidence. Mutuum Finance is the smart, utility-backed choice over meme-driven cryptocurrencies like DOGE. Thumzup Media’s $2.5M Investment Has the Potential to Be a Game-Changer for Dogecoin’s Future Dogecoin (DOGE) is winning back institutional confidence after Thumzup Media, a Trump family-supported business, made a substantial $2.5 million investment. The funding will enable DogeHash Technologies to expand its mining capacity exponentially, with over 4,000 mining rigs operational prior to year-end, one of the most extensive Dogecoin mining networks in the U.S. The addition of 500 new high-performance ASIC miners will expand the hash rate of the network, accelerating transaction speed, boosting security, and building further trust in the system as a whole. Thumzup’s entry, signaled by its recent acquisition of 19 BTC and 7.5 million DOGE and eventual investment of as much as $250 million in digital assets, is an indicator of growing institutional interest and confidence in Dogecoin’s long-term potential. Analysts predict the development to catalyze broader institutional uptake and boost DOGE’s position in mainstream crypto portfolios. But as Dogecoin fundamentals keep growing stronger, increasingly more investors are also investigating Mutuum Finance (MUTM), which could offer even greater upside potential beyond the meme-coin narrative. Mutuum Finance Presale Gains Traction Mutuum Finance is generating even more hype and anticipation for its presale, with the platform already raising over $16.8 million and having over 16,750 investors onboard to date. Stage 6 of the project is ongoing, during which MUTM tokens are available for purchase at $0.035 per token. In appreciation of early adopters, Mutuum Finance is hosting a $100,000 giveaway promotion, in which 10 users will be rewarded with $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens each. The protocol will have a dynamic floating interest rate mechanism that makes the most efficient use of liquidity. Low interest rate environments and excess liquidity environments encourage borrowing and ecosystem activity and high demand environments and higher interest rates encourage loan repayment and incoming capital flows. Fixed interest models function optimally when liquidity is constant, adjusting organically to overall market forces. Mutuum Finance Advances Development of Lending & Borrowing Protocol Mutuum Finance is going ahead with the development of its lending and borrowing protocol , a key step to enhancing its decentralized finance ecosystem. The first version (V1) of the protocol is expected on Sepolia Testnet in Q4 2025 and will include functionalities such as a liquidity pool, mtToken, debt token, liquidator bot, and more. ETH and USDT will be supported for lending, borrowing, and collateral at the time of launch, providing users with a convenient and secure DeFi experience. Lending, borrowing, and liquidation at a profit require efficient asset valuation. To this effect, Mutuum Finance uses Chainlink oracles to retrieve live USD and principal crypto asset prices such as ETH, MATIC, and AVAX. The platform realizes optimum data accuracy by utilizing fallback oracle systems, composite data feeds, and time-weighted averages from decentralized exchanges for quality valuations during the highly volatile and distressed market conditions. Dogecoin (DOGE) or Mutuum Finance (MUTM)? Dogecoin’s $2.5M mining incentive shows growing interest, but Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a far more promising prospect. At $0.035 and with over 55% sold, 16,750+ buyers and $16.8M invested, MUTM’s twin lending ecosystem, real-yield tokenomics, and upcoming DeFi protocol render it a utility-based altcoin with tremendous growth potential, which makes DOGE seem like a less desirable option for serious investors. DOGEUSD.title: Eric Trump: I Know Brad Garlinghouse and XRP Very Well
DOGEUSD.body: A single podcast moment has sent ripples through both the political and crypto worlds. During a recent appearance on the PBD Podcast, Eric Trump made striking comments about his familiarity with Ripple, XRP, and its CEO, Brad Garlinghouse. The clip, shared by popular crypto influencer JackTheRippler on X, quickly gained momentum — fueling widespread discussion about the growing intersection between politics and digital finance. The conversation took place during the October 4, 2025, episode of the PBD Podcast, hosted by entrepreneur Patrick Bet-David. When asked how he felt about Dogecoin, XRP, Ripple, and Ethereum, Eric Trump’s candid response caught the attention of the crypto community. “I know them all extremely well. I know Brad very well, and XRP, he’s done a great job,” Trump said. JackTheRippler’s post featuring the clip has since gone viral, with thousands of reposts and comments from the XRP community. Many enthusiasts see Trump’s acknowledgment of Garlinghouse as a symbolic nod to Ripple’s growing relevance in global finance — especially as the company continues to recover from years of legal scrutiny and reposition itself for mainstream adoption. Eric Trump says that he knows Brad Garlinghouse and #XRP very well! pic.twitter.com/EK4bygBRLh — JackTheRippler © (@RippleXrpie) October 4, 2025 A Notable Moment for Ripple and XRP Ripple’s reputation has strengthened considerably in 2025 following the conclusion of its legal dispute with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Ripple has focused on scaling its payment infrastructure and expanding the reach of RLUSD. In this context, Eric Trump’s praise for Brad Garlinghouse carries additional weight. His words come at a time when institutional interest in blockchain payment systems is accelerating — and when the U.S. political landscape is increasingly open to discussing crypto innovation within regulated frameworks. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Bridging Politics and Crypto Innovation Eric Trump’s remarks also highlight a broader trend: the mainstreaming of cryptocurrency within political and economic circles. His characterization of Bitcoin as “digital gold” and Ethereum as “financial oil” reflects an informed understanding of their roles within the digital economy. Yet, it was his personal acknowledgment of Brad Garlinghouse and XRP that truly resonated with investors, given Ripple’s established presence in institutional payment settlements. The moment signifies how figures within political leadership are beginning to publicly recognize the companies driving blockchain utility, not just speculative assets. In conclusion, while Eric Trump did not make any investment claims about XRP, his recognition of Brad Garlinghouse and Ripple stands as a noteworthy endorsement from a prominent political figure. The viral clip shared by JackTheRippler underscores how quickly influence, politics, and crypto narratives can converge — sometimes in just a few seconds of conversation. For Ripple and its supporters, those few words from the president’s son may have done more than spark social-media buzz; they reaffirmed that XRP’s name is now part of the mainstream financial dialogue. DOTUSD.title: U.S. tech giants reached $20.8 trillion market cap, surpassing the EU’s $19.4 trillion GDP milestone
DOTUSD.body: The Magnificent 7 collectively reached a combined market capitalization of $20.8 trillion, surpassing the EU’s GDP of $19.4 trillion. The GDP of the European Union stood at USD 19.42 trillion in 2024 and was expected to increase slightly to over USD 19.65 trillion in 2025. The European Commission revealed that the spring forecast projected real GDP growth in 2025 at 1.1% in the EU and 0.9% in the euro area, broadly the same rates attained in 2024 Magnificent 7 dominate global markets Nvidia reported a market valuation of $4.3 trillion, $165.2 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, and $115.4 billion in gross profit. Microsoft reported a market valuation of $3.85 trillion. In the fourth quarter of FY2025, Microsoft’s sales totalled $76.4 billion, representing an 18% increase over the previous year. Net income increased 24% to $27.2 billion, while operating income increased 23% to $34.3 billion. At $3.65, diluted earnings per share represented a 24% increase over the previous year. As of October 2, Apple had a market value of $3.78 trillion, bolstered by $190.7 billion in gross profit and $408.6 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, which yielded an annualized return of 17.52% over the past five years. Google’s Alphabet had a market valuation of $2.95 trillion, $371.4 billion in revenue, and $218.9 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 27.07%. Amazon had a market valuation of $2.34 trillion, $670.0 billion in revenue, and $332.4 billion in gross profit. Amazon has a 6.39% five-year return. Meta also reported a market valuation of $1.84 trillion, $178.8 billion in revenue, and $146.5 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 22.61%. As of October 2, Tesla’s market value stood at $1.48 trillion, bolstered by $16.2 billion in gross profit and $92.7 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, with a five-year annualized return of 24.38%. Global leaders warn as tech giants drive valuations beyond fundamentals 🇺🇸🇺🇸 Over 50% of the US market cap is now pure Tech. Defensives have collapsed to under 15%. This isn’t diversification – it’s a Tech Empire 🇺🇸🇺🇸 $tsla $nvda $google $appl #Bitcoin $qqq pic.twitter.com/taa4SxxSME — Hod | Code2Capital (@HodTzdaka) October 3, 2025 David Solomon, CEO of Goldman Sachs, warned on Friday at Italian Tech Week in Turin, that an AI investment frenzy may be overdone and that stock markets are due for a “drawdown.” Solomon said major US stock indexes have notched record high after record high this year on the promise of artificial intelligence. He argued that there’s a good chance that not all of those investments will deliver big returns. He noted that the internet craze of the late 1990s and early 2000s drew a frenzy of investment in tech companies at the time. Solomon reminded the crowd that the internet craze was followed by a dramatic collapse, which is commonly known as the “dot-com bubble”. “I wouldn’t be surprised if in the next 12 to 24 months, we see a drawdown with respect to equity markets.” David Solomon , Goldman Sachs CEO Jeff Bezos referred to the AI investment wave as an “industrial bubble.” He also emphasized that innovation stemming from such AI investment cycles can still yield long-term advantages. According to Bezos, the market is seeking the next big breakthrough, reminiscent of the dynamics of previous bubbles. He added that the previous bubble dynamic is why many small AI ventures with weak foundations receive investment. On October 3, Dario Perkins, TS Lombard’s Managing Director of Global Macro Research, raised an alarm when he noticed that big tech companies were increasingly using off-balance-sheet loans and special purpose entities (SPVs) to finance AI equipment. According to Perkins, this is a “recognition that this is getting out of hand.” Perkins emphasized that the real leverage and risk exposure of businesses like Meta, which has requested $29 billion in private finance for the expansion of its AI data centre, are concealed by such borrowing techniques. DOTUSD.title: Analyst: XRP Is on the Brink of Its Parabolic Run. Here’s the Timeline
DOTUSD.body: Markets have a way of testing conviction before rewarding it. For XRP holders, that moment of quiet before the storm feels closer than ever. After months of sideways consolidation and growing impatience, many analysts now believe XRP is positioning itself for a powerful move — one that could redefine its market trajectory when it finally unfolds. The Setup: Pattern and Price Renowned market observer The Crypto Philosopher recently shared a striking technical comparison between XRP’s current structure and Amazon’s chart from the early 2000s. In the video, XRP’s weekly chart is overlaid with Amazon’s long-term base that preceded its historic 14x rally from $5 to $70. The resemblance, he argues, is no coincidence. A cup-and-handle pattern is emerging in XRP’s chart, a classic bullish setup that typically precedes a significant upward move. According to The Crypto Philosopher, XRP’s current support sits firmly around $2.70, with a critical breakout level near $3.02. A confirmed move above this resistance, especially with increasing trading volume, could ignite a parabolic run — mirroring the way Amazon’s breakout unleashed years of compounding gains. Xrp is on the brink of its parabolic run It’ll happen when you least expect it Just keep waiting pic.twitter.com/laTpiG5nzE — The Crypto Philosopher (@TheCryptoP73649) October 2, 2025 The Amazon Analogy and Its Implications The comparison to Amazon is notable because it suggests XRP is following a similar pattern of accumulation before explosive growth. Just as Amazon built a foundation for years after the dot-com crash, XRP has been laying groundwork despite market doubts and regulatory challenges. While parallels between equities and digital assets should be drawn with caution, the core logic remains: strong fundamentals, persistent development, and an extended consolidation phase can set the stage for substantial upward revaluation. In XRP’s case, the alignment of technical structure, liquidity positioning, and renewed investor sentiment strengthens the bullish argument. The Expected Timeline If the pattern continues to unfold as projected, XRP could be entering the final stretch of its handle formation, a period that typically lasts from several days to a few weeks before a breakout confirmation. Analysts suggest that a decisive close above $3.02 would mark the official start of the next leg up. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 From there, momentum could accelerate rapidly, driven by institutional inflows, renewed market confidence, and increased adoption of Ripple’s technologies in real-world payments and tokenization. However, timing remains fluid. True parabolic runs rarely announce themselves in advance. As The Crypto Philosopher aptly noted, “It’ll happen when you least expect it.” Risks and Confirmation Signals Despite the bullish outlook, traders are urged to remain disciplined. False breakouts can occur, especially in a volatile market. To confirm the trend, analysts suggest looking for three key indicators: sustained volume growth, successful retests of new support levels, and overall crypto market strength driven by Bitcoin. In summary, XRP’s technical setup is nearing a crucial inflection point. If price and volume converge as anticipated, the conditions for a parabolic surge could soon align — turning patience into payoff for long-term believers. Yet, as every seasoned trader knows, conviction must be matched with caution, because even the most promising charts demand validation before the real run begins. He argued that there’s a good chance that not all of those investments will deliver big returns. He noted that the internet craze of the late 1990s and early 2000s drew a frenzy of investment in tech companies at the time. Solomon reminded the crowd that the internet craze was followed by a dramatic collapse, which is commonly known as the “dot-com bubble”. “I wouldn’t be surprised if in the next 12 to 24 months, we see a drawdown with respect to equity markets.” David Solomon , Goldman Sachs CEO Jeff Bezos referred to the AI investment wave as an “industrial bubble.” He also emphasized that innovation stemming from such AI investment cycles can still yield long-term advantages. According to Bezos, the market is seeking the next big breakthrough, reminiscent of the dynamics of previous bubbles. He added that the previous bubble dynamic is why many small AI ventures with weak foundations receive investment. On October 3, Dario Perkins, TS Lombard’s Managing Director of Global Macro Research, raised an alarm when he noticed that big tech companies were increasingly using off-balance-sheet loans and special purpose entities (SPVs) to finance AI equipment. According to Perkins, this is a “recognition that this is getting out of hand.” Perkins emphasized that the real leverage and risk exposure of businesses like Meta, which has requested $29 billion in private finance for the expansion of its AI data centre, are concealed by such borrowing techniques. UNIUSD.title: Big Move: Ethereum Foundation Trades $4.5M ETH For Stable Assets
UNIUSD.body: Ethereum’s steward moved part of its crypto coffers this week, converting a chunk of ETH into stablecoins as it adjusts how it funds projects and grants. Foundation Moves To Stablecoin Holdings According to reports, the Ethereum Foundation converted 1,000 ETH into stablecoins using the decentralized trading router CoW Swap, a transaction worth about $4.5 million at the time. The move was executed as part of the foundation’s ongoing treasury actions and was presented as a step to secure more predictable funds for research, grants, and donations. The specific stablecoin or coins received in exchange were not publicly named in initial reports. The Foundation’s treasurer has been managing a broader plan. Reports have disclosed a previously stated intention to convert up to 10,000 Ether over a period of weeks, and this latest trade appears to be an element of that phased approach rather than a one-off sale. Holding stable assets gives the foundation a clearer view of its short-term spending power while it evaluates longer-term strategy. 1/ Today, The Ethereum Foundation will convert 1000 ETH to stablecoins via @CoWSwap ‘s TWAP feature, as part of our ongoing work to fund R&D, grants and donations, and to highlight the power of DeFi. — Ethereum Foundation (@ethereumfndn) October 3, 2025 Use Of Decentralized Trading Tools The choice to use CoW Swap — a decentralized aggregator that aims to reduce slippage and market impact — was highlighted in public coverage. By routing the trade through decentralized infrastructure instead of a single centralized exchange, the Foundation reduced some counterparty and custody concerns. The execution method was described as careful and aimed at protecting the value of the sale during the swap. Alongside the transaction, internal operational decisions have also been articulated. The Foundation indicated it temporarily applied the breaks on open submissions of a grant for its Ecosystem Support Program in order to give attention to the large influx of proposals and prioritize urgent or high-impact work. Changes in leadership and institutional reorganization, have also been discussed publicly as part of recent organizational action, portrayed in a manner that suggests a transition is underway internally to accompany any change in the direction of treasury management as well. What Comes Next For The Treasury Market watchers noted that converting ETH to stablecoins is a common liquidity-management tactic. Volatility in ETH’s price can make budgeting for multi-month support programs difficult; stable assets can smooth out planning. While some community members saw the sale as a reduction of ETH holdings, others pointed out that the foundation’s core mission — to support Ethereum’s development — remains unchanged. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from TradingView

UNIUSD.title: U.S. tech giants reached $20.8 trillion market cap, surpassing the EU’s $19.4 trillion GDP milestone
UNIUSD.body: The Magnificent 7 collectively reached a combined market capitalization of $20.8 trillion, surpassing the EU’s GDP of $19.4 trillion. The GDP of the European Union stood at USD 19.42 trillion in 2024 and was expected to increase slightly to over USD 19.65 trillion in 2025. The European Commission revealed that the spring forecast projected real GDP growth in 2025 at 1.1% in the EU and 0.9% in the euro area, broadly the same rates attained in 2024 Magnificent 7 dominate global markets Nvidia reported a market valuation of $4.3 trillion, $165.2 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, and $115.4 billion in gross profit. Microsoft reported a market valuation of $3.85 trillion. In the fourth quarter of FY2025, Microsoft’s sales totalled $76.4 billion, representing an 18% increase over the previous year. Net income increased 24% to $27.2 billion, while operating income increased 23% to $34.3 billion. At $3.65, diluted earnings per share represented a 24% increase over the previous year. As of October 2, Apple had a market value of $3.78 trillion, bolstered by $190.7 billion in gross profit and $408.6 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, which yielded an annualized return of 17.52% over the past five years. Google’s Alphabet had a market valuation of $2.95 trillion, $371.4 billion in revenue, and $218.9 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 27.07%. Amazon had a market valuation of $2.34 trillion, $670.0 billion in revenue, and $332.4 billion in gross profit. Amazon has a 6.39% five-year return. Meta also reported a market valuation of $1.84 trillion, $178.8 billion in revenue, and $146.5 billion in gross profit, yielding a five-year annualized return of 22.61%. As of October 2, Tesla’s market value stood at $1.48 trillion, bolstered by $16.2 billion in gross profit and $92.7 billion in trailing twelve-month revenue, with a five-year annualized return of 24.38%. LTCUSD.title: Big Move: Ethereum Foundation Trades $4.5M ETH For Stable Assets
LTCUSD.body: Ethereum’s steward moved part of its crypto coffers this week, converting a chunk of ETH into stablecoins as it adjusts how it funds projects and grants. Foundation Moves To Stablecoin Holdings According to reports, the Ethereum Foundation converted 1,000 ETH into stablecoins using the decentralized trading router CoW Swap, a transaction worth about $4.5 million at the time. The move was executed as part of the foundation’s ongoing treasury actions and was presented as a step to secure more predictable funds for research, grants, and donations. The specific stablecoin or coins received in exchange were not publicly named in initial reports. The Foundation’s treasurer has been managing a broader plan. Reports have disclosed a previously stated intention to convert up to 10,000 Ether over a period of weeks, and this latest trade appears to be an element of that phased approach rather than a one-off sale. Holding stable assets gives the foundation a clearer view of its short-term spending power while it evaluates longer-term strategy. 1/ Today, The Ethereum Foundation will convert 1000 ETH to stablecoins via @CoWSwap ‘s TWAP feature, as part of our ongoing work to fund R&D, grants and donations, and to highlight the power of DeFi. — Ethereum Foundation (@ethereumfndn) October 3, 2025 Use Of Decentralized Trading Tools The choice to use CoW Swap — a decentralized aggregator that aims to reduce slippage and market impact — was highlighted in public coverage. By routing the trade through decentralized infrastructure instead of a single centralized exchange, the Foundation reduced some counterparty and custody concerns. The execution method was described as careful and aimed at protecting the value of the sale during the swap. Alongside the transaction, internal operational decisions have also been articulated. The Foundation indicated it temporarily applied the breaks on open submissions of a grant for its Ecosystem Support Program in order to give attention to the large influx of proposals and prioritize urgent or high-impact work. Changes in leadership and institutional reorganization, have also been discussed publicly as part of recent organizational action, portrayed in a manner that suggests a transition is underway internally to accompany any change in the direction of treasury management as well. What Comes Next For The Treasury Market watchers noted that converting ETH to stablecoins is a common liquidity-management tactic. Volatility in ETH’s price can make budgeting for multi-month support programs difficult; stable assets can smooth out planning. While some community members saw the sale as a reduction of ETH holdings, others pointed out that the foundation’s core mission — to support Ethereum’s development — remains unchanged. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from TradingView

LINKUSD.title: Crypto Meets Retail: Walmart-Linked Fintech Expands Into Digital Assets
LINKUSD.body: OnePay, the fintech linked to Walmart, plans to add crypto trading to its mobile banking app later in 2025, according to multiple reports. Sources told news outlets that users will be able to buy, sell and hold Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) inside the app, a move that would expand OnePay’s lineup of financial services beyond savings and cards. OnePay To Add Crypto Trading Reports have disclosed that the crypto functions will be powered through a tie-up with Zerohash, a firm that provides custody and settlement services for digital assets. That suggests OnePay will rely on outside infrastructure rather than build all systems itself. OnePay was launched in 2021 and is majority owned by Walmart, with early backing from Ribbit Capital, and the company has been steadily rolling out banking features since then. Partnerships And Product Plans OnePay is working with Synchrony to relaunch Walmart’s credit card offerings, and Reuters reported a Synchrony announcement dated June 9, 2025, about card programs set to return this fall. The app also aims to offer savings accounts and buy-now, pay-later options alongside the new crypto window. Users may be given the ability to convert crypto to fiat and then use those funds for purchases in Walmart stores or to pay card balances, though the exact mechanics have not been fully detailed by company spokespeople. How Much Will Users Get Access To At First? Several outlets suggest OnePay will start with the two largest tokens, BTC and ETH, rather than a long list of coins. Limits, fees and state availability were not disclosed in the reports, and those details could change before any public launch. Sources said the rollout is expected sometime later in 2025, with the credit card program arriving in fall 2025, but no firm launch date for crypto trading has been announced. Regulatory Hurdles And Timing Regulators at the state and federal level are actively watching crypto offerings from consumer apps, and compliance requirements could shape how quickly OnePay moves. Based On reports, the company has not publicly filed detailed disclosures tied to the crypto service, and both Walmart and OnePay declined to comment to reporters. That leaves open the possibility of a phased release, restricted to certain users or states at first. What This Means For Shoppers And Users If the plan proceeds, Walmart customers who already use OnePay could gain another way to access BTC and ETH without signing up for a separate crypto exchange. Analysts and users will be watching fees, protections for deposits, and whether the app allows spending crypto directly in stores or requires conversion first. AVAXUSD.title: Investing in ‘Uptober’? Brazil's Largest Investment Bank's Crypto Arm Names 5 Token Picks
AVAXUSD.body: Brazil’s largest investment bank, BTG Pactual’s crypto platform Mynt, has flagged five cryptocurrencies it believes are well-positioned for gains in October: bitcoin (BTC), ether (ETH), solana (SOL), avalanche (AVAX), and sky (SKY). The picks, outlined in a report authored by Matheus Parizotto and João Galhardo, reflect a broader optimism in the crypto market as U.S. interest rates ease and anticipation builds for new crypto ETFs. Bitcoin remains the dominant institutional pick, with more than $3.5 billion flowing into spot ETFs in September and corporate treasuries adding 43,000 BTC, over $5 billion at current prices. Mynt’s report describes it as a long-term anchor. “For those seeking a long-term pillar in their portfolio, BTC offers liquidity, network security, and a track record of adoption that extends beyond retail investors,” it reads. Ether, it says, continues to lead in on-chain finance. BTG Pactual’s team pointed out the network concentrates the majority of stablecoin volume and real-world asset tokenization projects. Over the last six months, U.S. spot ETFs added $11.3 billion in ETH, while corporate treasuries picked up 816,000 ETH in September alone. To the analysts, these flows show institutional appetite remains elevated. Beyond the top two Solana’s case hinges on speed and cost. The network, BTG Pactual pointed out, processed over $100 billion in decentralized exchange (DEX) volume for the third straight month, while its total value locked surpassed $30 billion for the first time in a sign of deepening DeFi liquidity. The analysts added that institutional demand has been increasing with the potential arrival of new spot SOL ETFs, which could lead to greater flows and visibility. “For those seeking exposure to high-performance infrastructure with growing adoption in real-world cases, Solana combines scale, competitive cost, and an accelerating network effect,” the report reads. For AVAX, BTG Pactual highlighted its sharp growth in on-chain activity, noting that daily transactions increased by 46% and stablecoin transfers rose by 421% over the last quarter. The network’s subnet architecture allows enterprises to spin up custom blockchains, boosting real-world use cases, it said. Sky Protocol, the rebranded MakerDAO, rounds out the list. Its stablecoin, USDS, has a circulating supply of nearly $8 billion, and its Sky Savings Rate offers a variable return that’s currently at 4.75%. Coupled with a token buyback program that’s already deployed $77 million, the report is positioning SKY as a revenue-generating DeFi token with long-term potential.

XRPUSD.title: Here’s What XRP Market Cap Multiplier Effect Means
XRPUSD.body: Every crypto bull market has its buzzwords, but few have sparked as much curiosity among XRP holders as the so-called “market cap multiplier effect.” It’s the idea that XRP’s true price potential isn’t limited by its large total supply — because only a fraction of that supply is actively available on the market. In other words, XRP’s liquidity reality may be far smaller than its theoretical supply, meaning smaller inflows of capital could trigger disproportionately large price reactions. Understanding the Market Cap Multiplier In a recent video, Jake Claver, managing partner at Digital Wealth Partners, tackled the growing debate head-on: “People look at total supply of XRP when, in reality, the supply-demand dynamics are going to be on the available supply of XRP,” he explained. This distinction — between XRP’s total supply of 100 billion and the much smaller circulating amount that actually trades — is at the heart of the multiplier effect. Let's look at what the XRP market cap multiplier effect means pic.twitter.com/5tiUdpHt6i — Jake Claver, QFOP (@beyond_broke) October 3, 2025 Claver illustrated this with a practical example: “There might be 2 billion XRP left on exchanges — probably less than that if you include retail and what they’re going to exit or sell.” He added that even if XRP’s price skyrockets to $10, $20, or even $50, some retail investors would inevitably sell portions of their holdings, adding perhaps another billion XRP to the liquid market. But that still represents a small share of total supply. The Math Behind the Multiplier Claver broke down the logic simply: “If you only had, let’s say, 2 billion [XRP] out of 100 billion, you’d be that 50x that Zach Rector talks about. It’s total supply versus available supply — and that’s why you get a shift in how much liquidity moving in is going to cause the market cap to rise in a multiplier effect.” When buyers enter the market, their demand impacts a smaller pool of available tokens, rather than the total supply. This limited float magnifies price movements, which in turn amplifies market capitalization faster than would occur in a fully distributed asset. Institutional Holdings and Market Liquidity Claver also revealed that his firm, Digital Wealth Partners, currently manages around 200 million XRP, accounting for roughly 8% of retail-owned XRP, based on his estimates. This institutional custody further concentrates holdings, reducing the amount of XRP readily available on exchanges. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 “Retail doesn’t hold more than maybe 1.2 to 2 billion total XRP in my opinion,” he said, emphasizing that these liquidity dynamics are critical for understanding XRP’s future price behavior. Broader Context and Implications While the multiplier concept doesn’t change XRP’s total supply — which remains capped at 100 billion — it reframes how market participants should interpret liquidity and price discovery. Ripple’s monthly escrow releases , typically capped at 1 billion XRP, also control how much new supply enters circulation, keeping active liquidity relatively tight. The takeaway is clear: XRP’s potential price response is not purely a function of total supply, but of how much XRP is actually tradable. As Claver summarized, “It’s total supply versus available supply. That’s the reason there is a multiplier effect.” The XRP market cap multiplier effect shows how small changes in liquidity can lead to significant price movements. It’s not speculation — it’s a structural feature of how XRP trades in real-world conditions, where limited availability magnifies every dollar of demand that flows into the asset. XRPUSD.title: Analyst: XRP Is on the Brink of Its Parabolic Run. Here’s the Timeline
XRPUSD.body: Markets have a way of testing conviction before rewarding it. For XRP holders, that moment of quiet before the storm feels closer than ever. After months of sideways consolidation and growing impatience, many analysts now believe XRP is positioning itself for a powerful move — one that could redefine its market trajectory when it finally unfolds. The Setup: Pattern and Price Renowned market observer The Crypto Philosopher recently shared a striking technical comparison between XRP’s current structure and Amazon’s chart from the early 2000s. In the video, XRP’s weekly chart is overlaid with Amazon’s long-term base that preceded its historic 14x rally from $5 to $70. The resemblance, he argues, is no coincidence. A cup-and-handle pattern is emerging in XRP’s chart, a classic bullish setup that typically precedes a significant upward move. According to The Crypto Philosopher, XRP’s current support sits firmly around $2.70, with a critical breakout level near $3.02. A confirmed move above this resistance, especially with increasing trading volume, could ignite a parabolic run — mirroring the way Amazon’s breakout unleashed years of compounding gains. Xrp is on the brink of its parabolic run It’ll happen when you least expect it Just keep waiting pic.twitter.com/laTpiG5nzE — The Crypto Philosopher (@TheCryptoP73649) October 2, 2025 The Amazon Analogy and Its Implications The comparison to Amazon is notable because it suggests XRP is following a similar pattern of accumulation before explosive growth. Just as Amazon built a foundation for years after the dot-com crash, XRP has been laying groundwork despite market doubts and regulatory challenges. While parallels between equities and digital assets should be drawn with caution, the core logic remains: strong fundamentals, persistent development, and an extended consolidation phase can set the stage for substantial upward revaluation. In XRP’s case, the alignment of technical structure, liquidity positioning, and renewed investor sentiment strengthens the bullish argument. The Expected Timeline If the pattern continues to unfold as projected, XRP could be entering the final stretch of its handle formation, a period that typically lasts from several days to a few weeks before a breakout confirmation. Analysts suggest that a decisive close above $3.02 would mark the official start of the next leg up. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 From there, momentum could accelerate rapidly, driven by institutional inflows, renewed market confidence, and increased adoption of Ripple’s technologies in real-world payments and tokenization. However, timing remains fluid. True parabolic runs rarely announce themselves in advance. As The Crypto Philosopher aptly noted, “It’ll happen when you least expect it.” Risks and Confirmation Signals Despite the bullish outlook, traders are urged to remain disciplined. False breakouts can occur, especially in a volatile market. To confirm the trend, analysts suggest looking for three key indicators: sustained volume growth, successful retests of new support levels, and overall crypto market strength driven by Bitcoin. In summary, XRP’s technical setup is nearing a crucial inflection point. If price and volume converge as anticipated, the conditions for a parabolic surge could soon align — turning patience into payoff for long-term believers. Yet, as every seasoned trader knows, conviction must be matched with caution, because even the most promising charts demand validation before the real run begins. XRPUSD.title: Analyst to XRP Holders: We Are in a Breakout Territory. Price May Pop at Any Point
XRPUSD.body: In the world of digital assets, momentum can shift in an instant. A single technical signal—especially on a higher-timeframe chart—can mark the difference between quiet consolidation and explosive upside. For XRP, that moment may be near. Analysts are closely monitoring the charts, where a rare combination of bullish signals is emerging, suggesting a potential price breakout could be imminent. Cryptoinsightuk Flags Bullish RSI Signal Market analyst Cryptoinsightuk has sounded the alarm for XRP holders, noting that the asset’s three-day chart is now showing a bullish Relative Strength Index (RSI) crossover alongside a strong three-day candle close. The analyst emphasized that this particular alignment has preceded major upward moves for XRP in the past—pointing to the last three instances on November 5, 2024, April 19, 2025, and June 27, 2025. We are in the territory where we could see a pop to the upside for $XRP at any point imo. We got a great 3 Day candle close yesterday and bullish cross on the 3 day RSI. Here are the last 3 times we saw this happen pic.twitter.com/NzPHCMjvqS — Cryptoinsightuk (@Cryptoinsightuk) October 4, 2025 Each of those historical signals coincided with significant bullish momentum, suggesting the current setup could mark the beginning of another leg higher. “We are in the territory where we could see a pop to the upside for XRP at any point,” Cryptoinsightuk wrote, reinforcing that the chart structure remains technically constructive. Understanding the Technical Setup A bullish RSI crossover occurs when short-term momentum breaks above its longer-term trend line—an early indication that buying pressure is starting to dominate. When this signal appears on the three-day timeframe, it’s more significant than similar signals on shorter intervals because it indicates sustained market strength rather than short-term volatility. Coupled with the recent strong candle close, this crossover suggests that bulls are regaining control after a period of consolidation. Historically, such alignments on XRP’s chart have led to strong continuation rallies, provided they are confirmed by volume and price action in subsequent sessions. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Resistance Levels and Market Context From a technical perspective, XRP faces its next resistance band between $3.20 and $3.65, a region that has repeatedly capped price advances in 2025. A decisive breakout and sustained close above that zone could unlock further upside momentum , potentially validating the “pop” scenario that traders like Cryptoinsightuk anticipate. Broader market conditions also favor bullish sentiment. Bitcoin remains strong above six-figure levels, overall liquidity has improved across digital assets, and institutional participation in on-chain settlement projects continues to grow. These factors collectively create an environment in which XRP could benefit from renewed investor confidence. Risk and Confirmation While optimism is building, analysts caution that no technical indicator guarantees results. RSI crossovers can produce false signals if volume fails to confirm or if sudden macro news shifts sentiment. Traders are advised to manage risk carefully, watch for volume-supported breakouts, and avoid over-leveraging positions during volatility spikes. The Bottom Line With momentum indicators in sync and historical patterns resurfacing, XRP seems poised for a potential breakout. As Cryptoinsightuk highlights, the market is once again positioned where a strong upward move could emerge at any time. Whether that surge materializes will depend on confirmation in the coming days—but for now, XRP sits squarely in what analysts call breakout territory . XRPUSD.title: XRP On-Chain Activity Signals Imminent Sell-Off — What’s Happening?
XRPUSD.body: An alarming pattern of XRP whale activity has been noted, posing several questions about the sustainability of the cryptocurrency’s growth. Among the multiple questions currently being asked, one is more demanding of an immediate response: Is an XRP whale sell-off on its way? XRP Supply Surges Across Major Exchanges In an October 3rd post on the social media platform X, market analyst CryptoOnchain highlighted a recent shift in the behavior of XRP’s largest holders, the whales. The online pundit’s report was based on the Exchange Supply Ratio indicator, which tracks the proportion of XRP tokens on exchanges relative to its total circulating supply. Related Reading: Bitcoin STH Exchange Inflows Hit $5.7B: Profit-Taking Already Underway? This metric can be used to derive insights on potential selling pressure for a crypto asset (XRP, in this case), seeing as higher values would suggest increased availability of tokens on the exchange for sale. According to CryptoOnchain, there has been a spike in XRP supply across major exchanges, suggesting that whales might be positioning for a significant sell-off. The data shared reflects the increase in selling pressure across these exchanges, including Bithumb, Bitget, Bitfinex, and Binance, putting the XRP price at an increased risk of a sharp correction. XRP Displays Bearish Divergence As Sellers Dominate Futures Market In a separate post made on the CryptoQuant platform, CryptoOnchain also revealed a budding negative divergence across the XRP futures market. The relevant indicator here is the Taker Buy Sell Ratio metric, which monitors the balance between aggressive buy and sell orders in the futures market. This metric is typically used to assess whether buyers or sellers are dominating the market in the short term. The analyst noted that while the price of XRP has been mostly around $3 after its recent rise, the ‘Taker Ratio’ across exchanges has fallen to its lowest level since November 2024. Interestingly, data from Binance, the world’s largest crypto exchange, further supports this bearish signal, as patterns similar to those seen on other exchanges have also been surfacing. Related Reading: Ethereum Matches Bitcoin In Annual Gains: What This Means For The Market CryptoOnchain explained that this situation could either mean that the market participants are booking profits or anticipating a price decline in the near future. BNBUSD.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: is BTC About to Explode to $130K This Week?
BNBUSD.body: Bitcoin has extended its rally after a clean breakout from the descending channel, reclaiming primary structural levels and driving toward the $122K–$124K all-time high. While momentum remains strongly bullish, the market is still exposed to a brief pullback toward $114K–$118K to rebalance before any potential continuation toward new highs. Technical Analysis By Shayan The Daily Chart Bitcoin has continued its upward expansion, breaking through the mid-range resistance and invalidating the prior descending structure that defined September’s price action. The breakout was followed by a rapid move into the upper boundary of the macro range, likely targeting the buy-side liquidity just above the all-time high around $124K. The price is now holding above the breakout level around $116K–$118K, with the previous decision point at $112K–$114K serving as key support in case of a retracement. Holding above this zone maintains the bullish structure, keeping the $124K–$125K region, where the next liquidity pool sits, as the primary upside target. Momentum indicators, however, suggest the potential for a short-term corrective move before continuation, allowing the market to build a healthier base for another impulsive leg higher. Source: TradingView The 4-Hour Chart The recent surge from the $108K demand zone triggered an impulsive rally that left behind several unmitigated areas of interest. The breaker block at $115K–$117K and the Fibonacci retracement cluster between $114.4K and $113.1K now mark the nearest re-entry zones for buyers. A controlled pullback toward these levels would likely attract renewed demand for continuation toward $124K, where the next major buy-side liquidity cluster lies. If price maintains its current momentum, a sweep above $124K could occur before a corrective phase, aligning with the broader bullish expansion structure as long as the market holds above $111K–$112K. Source: TradingView Sentiment Analysis By Shayan Bitcoin’s open interest on Binance has reached a new record, edging past the August peak of $14.306B. This surge coincides with the latest rally, as BTC has climbed from $108K to $124K, while open interest has expanded from $11.5B to $14.3B in just a few weeks. The parallel rise in both price and open interest confirms that the move has been powered by fresh inflows and new position openings, rather than a short-covering squeeze. This expansion highlights strong conviction from traders on both sides, with institutional and retail participation adding depth to the market. However, the sheer scale of leverage now in play introduces risk. Elevated open interest often acts as a double-edged sword: it can amplify upside moves as trapped shorts unwind, but it can just as quickly trigger liquidation cascades if price momentum stalls. For now, the structure favors continuation, with BTC pressing into new liquidity zones between $125K and $130K. Yet, the danger lies in the market’s fragility. If Bitcoin fails to extend higher and consolidates while open interest stays elevated, the likelihood of a sharp flush grows, potentially dragging price back toward key demand zones before the broader bullish trend resumes. In short, record-high open interest reflects both confidence and vulnerability. Traders should closely watch whether open interest continues rising or starts to unwind, as this will determine if the next leg extends smoothly into $130K or if a leverage-driven shakeout interrupts the rally. The post Bitcoin Price Analysis: is BTC About to Explode to $130K This Week? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

ETCUSD.title: Arbitrum price prediction 2025 – 2031: Will ARB recapture $2?
ETCUSD.body: Key takeaways: Our ARB predictions anticipate a high of $0.82 in 2025. In 2027, it will range between $1.01 and $1.22, with an average price of $1.04. In 2030, it will range between $2.98 and $3.51, with an average price of $3.08. Layer 2s have made quite a buzz over the last few months because of their high network activity. Arbitrum led the Layer 2 pack with a total value locked ( TVL ) of $2.53 billion. Arbitrum is an Optimistic Rollup solution that shifts network operations away from the Ethereum mainnet while maintaining Ethereum-level security. Arbitrum’s BOLD testnet also went live; when integrated into the mainnet, the update will enable permissionless validation on Arbitrum. ETCUSD.title: Analyst: XRP Is on the Brink of Its Parabolic Run. Here’s the Timeline
ETCUSD.body: Markets have a way of testing conviction before rewarding it. For XRP holders, that moment of quiet before the storm feels closer than ever. After months of sideways consolidation and growing impatience, many analysts now believe XRP is positioning itself for a powerful move — one that could redefine its market trajectory when it finally unfolds. The Setup: Pattern and Price Renowned market observer The Crypto Philosopher recently shared a striking technical comparison between XRP’s current structure and Amazon’s chart from the early 2000s. In the video, XRP’s weekly chart is overlaid with Amazon’s long-term base that preceded its historic 14x rally from $5 to $70. The resemblance, he argues, is no coincidence. A cup-and-handle pattern is emerging in XRP’s chart, a classic bullish setup that typically precedes a significant upward move. According to The Crypto Philosopher, XRP’s current support sits firmly around $2.70, with a critical breakout level near $3.02. A confirmed move above this resistance, especially with increasing trading volume, could ignite a parabolic run — mirroring the way Amazon’s breakout unleashed years of compounding gains. Xrp is on the brink of its parabolic run It’ll happen when you least expect it Just keep waiting pic.twitter.com/laTpiG5nzE — The Crypto Philosopher (@TheCryptoP73649) October 2, 2025 The Amazon Analogy and Its Implications The comparison to Amazon is notable because it suggests XRP is following a similar pattern of accumulation before explosive growth. Just as Amazon built a foundation for years after the dot-com crash, XRP has been laying groundwork despite market doubts and regulatory challenges. While parallels between equities and digital assets should be drawn with caution, the core logic remains: strong fundamentals, persistent development, and an extended consolidation phase can set the stage for substantial upward revaluation. In XRP’s case, the alignment of technical structure, liquidity positioning, and renewed investor sentiment strengthens the bullish argument. The Expected Timeline If the pattern continues to unfold as projected, XRP could be entering the final stretch of its handle formation, a period that typically lasts from several days to a few weeks before a breakout confirmation. Analysts suggest that a decisive close above $3.02 would mark the official start of the next leg up. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 From there, momentum could accelerate rapidly, driven by institutional inflows, renewed market confidence, and increased adoption of Ripple’s technologies in real-world payments and tokenization. However, timing remains fluid. True parabolic runs rarely announce themselves in advance. As The Crypto Philosopher aptly noted, “It’ll happen when you least expect it.” Risks and Confirmation Signals Despite the bullish outlook, traders are urged to remain disciplined. False breakouts can occur, especially in a volatile market. To confirm the trend, analysts suggest looking for three key indicators: sustained volume growth, successful retests of new support levels, and overall crypto market strength driven by Bitcoin. In summary, XRP’s technical setup is nearing a crucial inflection point. If price and volume converge as anticipated, the conditions for a parabolic surge could soon align — turning patience into payoff for long-term believers. Yet, as every seasoned trader knows, conviction must be matched with caution, because even the most promising charts demand validation before the real run begins.
